basics.name: Bastien C. M. Vieublé
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher
basics.summary: My research focuses on using approximate computing techniques for the ease of high performance linear algebra algorithms. I attach great importance to covering the algorithms from a theory-focused standpoint to their implementation on parallel supercomputers for the solution of academic and industrial applications.

projects.name: MUMPS solver
projects.summary: My Ph.D. thesis was made in collaboration with MUMPS Technology to help improve the sparse direct solver MUMPS. The MUMPS solver is used by many important international companies, such as, EDF, Michelin, ANSYS, SHELL, etc.
